issue.title: [Rust] Calculate the size of a RecordBatch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12156](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12156). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can compute the size of an array, but there's no facility yet to compute the size of a recordbatch.

This is useful if we need to measure the size of data we're about to write.
